node.category: What is the way things are?

node.surface: A stop must be put to exorbitant rents

node.category: How can one stop exorbitant rents?

node.surface: by imposing a limit on rent increases when changing residences.

node.category: How are things with affordable living space?

node.surface: For affordable living space is scarce.

node.category: What type of flats are people looking for?

node.surface: Besides, a higher degree of luxury (expensive flats) is not necessary for the majority of the people,
but rather a flat at all.

node.category: Why is there no specific type of flat?

node.surface: Plus everyone has to move approx. 3-10 times in his or her life,

node.category: Why is it common to move?

node.surface: because the size of the desired accommodation changes over the course of a lifetime.
